TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AggregateException extends System.Exception
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AggregateException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 表示在应用程序执行过程中发生的一个或多个错误。

span.span: Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于将多个故障合并为单个 java.lang.throwable exception 对象。 is used to consolidate multiple failures into a single, throwable exception object. 它广泛用于[任务并行库（TPL）](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md)和[并行 LINQ （PLINQ）](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md)。It is used extensively in the [Task Parallel Library (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md) and [Parallel LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md). 有关详细信息，请参阅[异常处理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)和[如何：处理 PLINQ 查询中的异常](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md)。For more information, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md) and [How to: Handle Exceptions in a PLINQ Query](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md). 有关其他信息，请参阅 .NET 重要博客中的[聚合异常](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2009/brownfield/aggregating-exceptions)条目。For additional information, see the [Aggregating Exceptions](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2009/brownfield/aggregating-exceptions) entry in the .NET Matters blog. ## Examples 下面的示例捕获 异常，并调用 方法来处理它包含的每个异常。The following example catches the exception and calls the method to handle each exception it contains. 使用第一个 `task1` 变量编译和运行该示例时，应生成一个包含 异常的 对象。Compiling and running the example with the first `task1` variable should result in an object that contains an exception. 注释掉该行，取消注释第二个 `task1` 变量，编译并运行该示例将生成一个包含 异常的 对象。Commenting out that line, uncommenting the second `task1` variable, and compiling and running the example produces an object that contains an exception. [!code-csharp[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/cs/exception1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/vb/exception1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护成员都是线程安全的，可从多个线程并发使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的 属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息，如 "AggregateException：发生了一个或多个错误。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.AggregateException Flatten() cil managed

summary.span: 将 实例平展入单个新实例。

span.span: Flattens an instances into a single, new instance.
A new, flattened .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个任务具有引发异常的附加子任务，则在将该异常传播到父任务之前，该异常包装在 异常中，这会在将该异常传播回调用线程之前，将该异常包装在自己的 异常中。If a task has an attached child task that throws an exception, that exception is wrapped in an exception before it is propagated to the parent task, which wraps that exception in its own exception before it propagates it back to the calling thread. 在这种情况下，、、 或 方法捕获的 异常的 属性包含一个或多个 实例，而不包含导致错误的原始异常。In such cases, the property of the exception that is caught by the , , or method contains one or more instances, not the original exceptions that caused the fault. 若要避免不得不循环访问嵌套的 异常，可以使用 方法删除所有嵌套的 异常，使返回 对象的 属性包含原始异常。To avoid having to iterate over nested exceptions, you can use the method to remove all the nested exceptions, so that the property of the returned object contains the original exceptions. 此方法以递归方式平展作为当前 实例的内部异常的 异常的所有实例。This method recursively flattens all instances of exceptions that are inner exceptions of the current instance . 新 中返回的内部异常是当前 实例中的异常树的所有内部异常的并集。The inner exceptions returned in the new are the union of all the inner exceptions from exception tree rooted at the current instance. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，嵌套 实例已经平展，并且仅在一个循环中处理。In the following example, nested instances are flattened and handled in just one loop. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/flatten2.cs#22)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/flatten2.vb#22)] 还可以使用 方法，通过多个任务在一个 实例中抛出的多个 实例重新抛出内部异常，如下面的示例所示。You can also use the method to rethrow the inner exceptions from multiple instances thrown by multiple tasks in a single instance, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions2.vb#13)]

span.span: Exception Handling (Task Parallel Library)
Aggregating Exceptions

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Handle(class System.Func`2<class System.Exception, bool> predicate) cil managed
Public Sub Handle (predicate As Func(Of Exception, Boolean))

param.name: predicate
param.span: 每个异常要执行的谓词。

span.span: The predicate to execute for each exception.

param.span: 该谓词作为要处理的 的参数并返回一个布尔值以指示是否处理了该异常。

span.span: The predicate accepts as an argument the to be processed and returns a Boolean to indicate whether the exception was handled.

summary.span: 在每个由此 包含的 上调用处理程序。

span.span: Invokes a handler on each contained by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用 `predicate` 都将返回 true 或 false，以指示是否处理了 。Each invocation of the `predicate` returns true or false to indicate whether the was handled. 在所有调用完成后，如果未处理任何异常，则所有未经处理的异常将被放入新的 中。After all invocations, if any exceptions went unhandled, all unhandled exceptions will be put into a new which will be thrown. 否则， 方法只返回。Otherwise, the method simply returns. 如果 `predicate` 的任何调用引发了异常，则它将暂停处理任何其他异常，并立即按原样传播引发的异常。If any invocations of the `predicate` throws an exception, it will halt the processing of any more exceptions and immediately propagate the thrown exception as-is. ## Examples 通常，捕获 异常的异常处理程序使用 `foreach` 循环（在中C#）或 `For Each` 循环（在 Visual Basic 中）处理其 集合中的每个异常。Ordinarily, an exception handler that catches an exception uses a `foreach` loop (in C#) or `For Each` loop (in Visual Basic) to handle each exception in its collection. 相反，下面的示例使用 方法来处理每个异常，并且仅重新引发不 `CustomException` 实例的异常。Instead, the following example uses the method to handle each exception, and only re-throws exceptions that are not `CustomException` instances. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/handlemethod2.cs#16)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/handlemethod2.vb#16)] 下面是一个更完整的示例，该示例使用 方法为枚举文件时的 提供特殊处理。The following is a more complete example that uses the method to provide special handling for an when enumerating files. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions.cs#12)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions.vb#12)]

span.span: The argument is null.

exception.span: 未处理此 包含的异常。
